site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live birds.
citations.narrative:
The transport enclosure used to hold/transport the Buteo Buteo needs to be cleaned. There is a dry hard buildup of
excreta on the door and floor of the enclosure. Regular cleaning/sanitizing is necessary to prevent contamination of the
bird, odors, pests and disease hazards. An enclosure used to hold or transport birds must be cleaned and sanitized
before each use. Correct by 6/24/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
This inspection was conducted at an event of the White County Library in Sparta, TN.
n

narrative:
3.162(c) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live birds. 
The transport enclosure used to hold/transport the Buteo Buteo needs to be cleaned. There is a dry hard buildup of 
excreta on the door and floor of the enclosure. Regular cleaning/sanitizing is necessary to prevent contamination of the 
bird, odors, pests and disease hazards. An enclosure used to hold or transport birds must be cleaned and sanitized 
before each use. Correct by 6/24/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.  
 
This inspection was conducted at an event of the White County Library in Sparta, TN.
